title: Obsidian CEO says he wants to make another Fallout
description: As Feargus Urqhuart put it, "my hope is that before I ride off into the sunset, I'd love to make another Fallout game."

title: Bayonetta voice actress urges players to boycott next game, citing insulting treatment by developer Platinum
description: Hellena Taylor claims series creator Hideki Kamiya personally offered her a flat rate $4,000 to voice the character in Bayonetta 3.

title: Magic: The Gathering has banned my beloved Meathook Massacre
description: Look how they massacred my boy.
